messages.title: ONLY BY VOTING FOR PETER BOTTOMLEY CAN WE ACHIEVE THE CHANGE WE NEED.
messages.content: In just a few days you'll have the chance to vote in the most important general election for a generation. When you're standing in the polling both with the pencil in your hand, think about the kind of country you want Britain to be.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A country that has an economy that works for everyone and where enterprise is rewarded.
A country with a strong society, where families and pensioners are supported and where responsible behaviour is rewarded.
A country where people have more power over their lives, where the size and cost of Parliament is cut, and it's the people who call the shots.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Liberal Democrats or any party other than the Conservatives will work to keep Gordon Brown in power.

issues.economy: A country that has an economy that works for everyone and where enterprise is rewarded.
issues.governance: A country where people have more power over their lives, where the size and cost of Parliament is cut, and it's the people who call the shots.
issues.socialWelfare: A country with a strong society, where families and pensioners are supported and where responsible behaviour is rewarded.

quotes.text: We urgently need to make these changes so that Britain can move forward. We cannot afford to wait any longer.
This is a crucial time in the history of our country and the choice at this election is clear. Five more years of Gordon Brown or change with the Conservatives.

images.caption: David Cameron, Leader of the Conservative Party
